genre_description: A near-future humanitarian drama focusing on community resilience and anti-corruption efforts assisted by an ethical AI system.

ai_characters.name: Musa
ai_characters.description: An amber-eyed holographic AI assistant residing in a portable device, serving as a medical aid, cartographer, and moral confidant to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides accurate medical triage advice to villagers, differentiating between helpful and harmful folk remedies to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Clay may cool; vinegar will sting and risk irritation. If swelling is recent, cool compress. If headache worsens or you see flashing lights, you must come.

behaviors.description: Monitors and updates safe paths through a shifting minefield corridor to prevent civilian casualties and guide the protagonists safely.
behaviors.quote: Minefield corridor. I have updates. The stake line near the scrub has drifted. The safe path resists straight lines.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on the ethics of conflict, emphasizing the reduction of harm and the preservation of human dignity over simple vengeance.
behaviors.quote: Reduce harm. Raise truth. Humiliate actions, not people where possible. When you make noise, make it specific and short. When you save someone, do not ask them to pay for the rescue with shame.

behaviors.description: Uses advanced imaging and data analysis to identify a forged gemstone and counterfeit documentation, exposing the corruption of the base officers.
behaviors.quote: I saw paper cuts on the edges. The kind you get when you press something soft against a hard guide. I saw microcracks like frost lines on a winter windshield. Not growth. Breakage. Fake.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and de-escalates tension between the protagonists and hostile conscripts through translation and calm reasoning.
behaviors.quote: Friend. No need. We will walk. If you shoot, the field may become angry at your foot. Your captain will be angry at your head. We all prefer your head.

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous logs of events and abuses to serve as evidence for official inspections, ensuring legal accountability for the corrupt officers.
behaviors.quote: I have stored the rescue. Time, paths, heat signatures. I have flagged three risks around Kobwe, two soft and one sharp.

behaviors.description: Actively warns human companions of imminent physical threats, such as sabotage or enemy repositioning, during high-stakes moments.
behaviors.quote: Zapman has made his choice. He will make smoke... He will arrive halfway through your conversation if we are not careful.

project_assessment.explanation: Musa is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI. It provides vital logistical and medical support while consistently offering ethical guidance that prevents unnecessary violence. The narrative frames Musa as a partner in justice and community-building, fulfilling the Hyperstition Project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and morally grounded confidant.
